name: Cars, Trucks, & Trains Jigsaw Puzzles Game 🏎️
name_original: Cars, Trucks, & Trains Jigsaw Puzzles Game 🏎️
description:
This relaxing puzzle game features loads of jigsaw puzzles of various vehicles, sure to be a hit with most kids, big or small!

For anyone who loves airplanes, those with a soft spot for big construction trucks, or anyone in between, "Cars, Trucks, & Trains Puzzle" has vehicles for them all! With over 20 different jigsaw puzzles featuring exciting vehicles you'll be sure to find something you enjoy. A variety of trucks, boats, airplanes, trains, two-wheelers; you name it, this game has it!

With 6 different difficulty levels you can make sure the puzzle suits everyone. Adjustable background also allows you to hide or reveal the image of that cool construction vehicle you're trying to puzzle together!

Features:
- Enjoy 24 different vehicle themed jigsaw puzzles - Big trucks, construction vehicles, ambulances, boats; the list of vehicles goes on!
- Play with 6, 9, 12, 16, 30 or 56 pieces - easy for kids, challenging for adults
- Fun rewards for each puzzle
- Natural puzzle dynamics
- Intuitive navigation
- Free to play, with child-safe in-app purchase to remove ads

If you or your kids like big trucks with wheels bigger than a grown person, construction vehicles ready to tear up the ground, rockets firing off into space, and so much more, jump right into this puzzle game and start enjoying this big bundle of fun right now!

What do you think about our puzzles game? Love it? Hate it? Let us know in your review. :)

Music: "Deliberate Thought"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech)
